name: Liko Maraiwai
story: Liko Maraiwai grew up in a small seaside town in Martinique. He joined the French army when he was 19 and went on to become a skilled marksman with a particular talent for trading weapons. He was recruited by the Independent faction in order to help arm their troops. Despite being deeply committed to his work, he is also known for his friendly nature and his skill in boosting morale amongst the troops.
